N = int(input())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

cnt = 0
for i in range(N):
    if h[i] > cnt:

        cnt = h[i]
print(cnt)

n = int(input())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(n):
    if h[i] > 0:
        ans += 1
        for j in range(i+1, n):
            if h[j] > 0:
                h[j] -= 1


print(ans)

n = int(input())
w = list(map(int, input().split()))


ans = float('inf')


for i in range(n):
    w1 = w[:i]
    w2 = w[i:]
    ans = min(ans, abs(sum(w1) - sum(w2)))

print(ans)

N = int(input())
h = list(map(int,input().split()))

cnt = h[0]
for i in range(N):
    if h[i] > cnt:
        cnt = h[i]
print(cnt)


import sys
N, A, B = map(int, input().split())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))
ans = 0
for i in range(N-1):
    ans += min((x[i+1]-x[i])*A, B)
print(ans)
